MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Cowan Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 8:43PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site, further fault finding investigations are required, additional resources are making their way to site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:43PM on 13 January 2021
